_description: Paraphrase of the hymn ‘Crux fidelis’ — six lines

OxfMert248.First Lines:
Stetdefast crosse inmong alle oþeryow art a tre mykel of
                    prise…
OxfMert248.Last Lines:
…and swete be þe treand swete be þe birdyn þat
                    hangis vp pon the
